org.jcsp.util.filter
Interface FilteredChannelInput

All Superinterfaces:
ChannelInput, Poisonable, ReadFiltered
All Known Subinterfaces:
FilteredSharedChannelInput, MigratableChannelInput
All Known Implementing Classes:
FilteredAltingChannelInput, FilteredSharedChannelInputWrapper, MigratableAltingChannelInput
public interface FilteredChannelInput
extends ChannelInput, ReadFiltered

Interface for a channel input end that supports filtering operations.

Author:
Quickstone Technologies Limited
